name: Sheep Keep (Wefiends)
description:
Sheep Keep

LD46 - KEEP IT ALIVE

Gentle little sheep will follow you around. Try to lead them home while keeping the wolves at bay.

There are hidden lost sheep around the world, try to find all of them. (They're just static, but it's a fun scavenger hunt)

Thanks for playing everyone!

This is our... I think 8th attempt at Ludum Dare. We don't always finish sadly, but we hope you enjoy walking around in the little world we made. 

CONTROLS:
Keyboard and Mouse
Click to shoot, hold to shoot further

TEAM:
Programming - Nick Barrios
Art- Kevin Barrios
Music - Stephanie Fung
